tool_description: Use a pretrained saprot backbone model and a pretrained adaptor model to do residue-level classification task

required_parameters.name: protein_sequence
required_parameters.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the protein.

required_parameters.name: lora_adaptor
required_parameters.description: The adaptor model to be used for localization prediction.

return_values.name: pred
return_values.description: A series of values indicating whether each residue belongs to which category
